description:
The Senior Director of Sales position is an individual contributor role. The candidate must have prior enterprise software sales experience. The Director of Sales will focus on personal quota attainment by targeting corporate enterprise prospects. This position can be remote (home-based) or based in one of our physical office locations.

In this client-facing role, you will be responsible for:
• Representing Exterro’s entire suite of E-discovery, privacy and Legal GRC software products.
• Uncovering Enterprise opportunities at the largest accounts and aligning the client’s future vision with Exterro’s differentiated capabilities.
• Focusing on the enterprise sale and large subscription deals where the sales cycle is deep, wide and complex.
• Working to expand existing customers and close net new large enterprise accounts in North America

Key Responsibilities:
• Achieve quarterly and annual quotas as set forth by management.
• Maximize sales productivity through consistent use of defined sales processes.
• Remain educated and demonstrate competency on the growing E-Discovery, Privacy, and Legal GRC marketplace and Exterro’s products and product roadmaps.
• Develop effective relationships with partners to collaboratively drive additional revenue.
• Keep Salesforce up-to-date and accurate at all times.
• Manage all marketing campaigns within your assigned territory.
• Manage expense reports within the agreed upon terms set forth by management.
• Actively participate in leadership meetings and interact with the Product and Marketing teams on a regular basis to enhance Exterro’s products and market position.
• Represent Exterro at industry events.
• Collaborate with your BDR to build account plans and drive new business opportunities.
• Any other relevant tasks as assigned by management.

Education and Experience:
• Extensive experience in selling enterprise software to both IT and legal.
• Advanced understanding of contracts, terms and conditions and solid negotiation skills as well as strong closing skills.
• Ability to work remotely from a home office.
• Ability to use Saleforce.com or other CRM tools.
• Driven by targets, ability to run fast and help a market leader extend its lead.
• Must be willing to travel 30-50% of the time.
• Must be a strong team player, open to new ideas, highly motivated with a positive attitude, coordinate well with marketing and national sales teams.
• Experience selling complex 6 or 7 figure enterprise software deals in Fortune 500 companies.
• Demonstrated quota attainment over multiple years.
• Ability to self-generate large opportunities through effective account planning and communication.

Please apply directly on our career's page https://www.exterro.com/about/careers/

Exterro is an equal opportunity employer, participates in E-Verify and is a drug-free workplace. All employment offers are contingent upon successful passing of a background check. You will be required to sign a non-competition agreement for this role.

Exterro offers a competitive salary for this position and an excellent benefit package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, 401K, and more. For more information on the base salary range please contact careers@ exterro.com.
